Posts.Content: Is anyone taking the brand Actavis Anastrazole?  I am interested in any side effects they are experiencing.  I am on Arimidex but have changed my GP and they are refusing to give me Arimidex but want to give me the make Actavis.
Posts.Title: Actavis Anastrazole

Posts.Content: Thank you for your reply Chloe, I have been on Arimidex for two years, my new GP isn't even giving me the option to try different brands.  I also suffered with the hot flushes but found acupuncture has taken them away, I don't suffer them at all now. It may be worth you trying.
Posts.Title: Actavis Anastrazole
